descriptionlist.description: Tweak count right on your settings app. Supports Orion, Shuffle & the app TweakSettings. NOTE: it ONLY counts tweaks with preference bundles, hence why it's located in the settings app. I didn't feel like bloating up the code counting the total number of packages or making filters. This gives a concise & accurate count of the tweaks you have right there on the section you're standing. Handcrafted icon by @jam_minty.

changelog.change: Added support for OneSettings & fixed Shuffle.
